name: Pizzy
description:
We are building a post-pandemic food delivery startup, unlike anything on the market. We are on a mission to create next-generation pizza company. Pizza is the most popular product in restaurants, supermarkets and restaurants in the UK. Yet, struggling restaurants will not see the levels of business and customer activity they once had seen before the pandemic. We are building a foodtech startup on a completely sustainable grounds and looking forward to disrupt the food and takeaway industries. Only 1% of the global food industry is currently online. 

We are here to fix some of this forever.
Stay safe.

team.name: Zahar Zelensky
team.bioHtml: UBS, GSA Capital, DealGlobe, Clearmatics, Bitsmarter.

jobs.title: CTO Co-founder
jobs.description:
Hi,

I am looking for a technical co-founder with a strong interest in the hospitality/food industry. Good knowledge and experience of the UK takeaway industry are super beneficial. Building a food delivery startup for the post pandemic world.

Main requirements 
- Ability to build and scale the platform (software development, coding, mobile development, programming, testing, design)
- Experience to move from idea, MVP, the final product
- Experience and interest in the UK takeaway, food, hospitality industry
- Openminded, committed, hardworking, goal setter/achiever
-  Motivated to join a start-up as a co-founder

The role is unpaid until funding is secured - estimated in Q3-Q4 2020 - Q1 2021
Co-Founder equity is negotiable

For any questions please get in touch. Thanks. 
Stay save!
